title: Cat Life Simulator 3D
description: Cat Life Simulator is an adventure game where you experience life as a cat! Explore diverse locations, hunt animals, and complete quests for both animals and humans. Upgrade your skills, collect rare items for your home, and cook food. Help your cat grow, start a family, and raise strong kittens. Customize your catâ€™s appearance, buy home items, and earn rewards for your achievements!
